code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Base.css';import{Pagination,Stack,Box,Typography,Table,TableBody,TableCell,TableContainer,TableHead,TableRow,Paper}from'@mui/material';import axios from'axios';import BaseURL from'../App';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Base=()=>{const[problems,setProblems]=useState([]);const[currentPage,setCurrentPage]=useState(1);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProblems=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(BaseURL,"/find_All_Paginated"),{input:{page:currentPage,size:5}});const responseData=response.data;setProblems(responseData);}catch(error){console.error(error);}};fetchProblems();},[currentPage]);const handleChange=(event,value)=>{setCurrentPage(value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Base",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{style:{width:1100},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"h1",gutterBottom:true,children:"Problem Base"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableContainer,{component:Paper,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableHead,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Topic"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:"Difficulty"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:problems.map((problem,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{style:{backgroundColor:index%2===1?'#B9DEC1':'transparent'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:problem.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{style:{width:300},children:problem.topic}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{style:{width:200},children:problem.difficulty})]},index))})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Stack,{style:{marginTop:10},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pagination,{count:124,page:currentPage,onChange:handleChange})})]});};export default Base;
